abstract: The company has been awarded $33.2 million in a lawsuit against an Internet services company that it claimed had registered hundreds of domain names with Verizon trademarks.
snippet: The company has been awarded $33.2 million in a lawsuit against an Internet services company that it claimed had registered hundreds of domain names with Verizon trademarks.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Communications, the telecommunications company, has been awarded $33.2 million in a lawsuit against an Internet services company that it claimed had registered hundreds of domain names with Verizon trademarks.

headline.main: Verizon Wins $33 Million in Suit Over Domain Names
headline.print_headline: Verizon Wins $33 Million In Suit Over Domain Names
